channel.title: Example NomadCast Podcast
channel.description: Example RSS feed for a Reticulum-hosted podcast served through NomadCast, with episode files hosted under a Nomad Network /file/ path.
channel.itunes:author: NomadCast Demo Crew
channel.itunes:summary: A clean, production-shaped RSS file you can copy, rename, and publish with Nomad Network; host your episode files under /file/.

item.title: CCC — Reticulum: Unstoppable Networks for The People
item.itunes:author: Chaos Communication Congress (CCC)
item.itunes:subtitle: Reticulum as a people-first, unstoppable networking layer.
item.description: A community talk titled “Reticulum: Unstoppable Networks for The People.” Credit to the Chaos Communication Congress (CCC) community recording where the original talk appeared. Use this as a placeholder and swap in your own episode details once you publish.

item.title: Option Plus — How to Fix the Internet (Nostr, Reticulum, and other ideas)
item.itunes:author: Option Plus
item.itunes:subtitle: Big-ideas chat about rebuilding the internet.
item.description: An Option Plus conversation about Nostr, Reticulum, and what comes next for the web. Please replace this credit with the exact source details for your own show.
